Section.Paragraph: The Trlcon program has been adapted as an aid to the analysis of syntax in poetry with the hope of identifying the dominant patterns that characterize a poet's style.

An extensive analysis of a poet' s poems with the aid of a program llke Trlcon could provide the basis for a formulaic expression of the poet's syntactic habits, as a set of patterns and deviances.
